mapper.select: SELECT id, `target_id` as targetId, `target_type` as targetType, `action`, `lcd`, `server_id` as serverId, `data` as dataStr FROM `cmdb_schema_audit` WHERE server_id = #{value} AND is_failed = 0 ORDER BY lcd LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ${tableName} ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'id', `cientity_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '配置项id', `target_cientity_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '目标配置项id', `attr_id` bigint(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '属性id', `ci_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '模型id', `target_ci_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '目标模型id', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_cientity_id` (`cientity_id`) USING BTREE, KEY `idx_target_cientity_id` (`target_cientity_id`) USING BTREE, KEY `idx_target_ic_id` (`target_ci_id`) USING BTREE, KEY `idx_ci_id` (`ci_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE ${tableName} ( `rel_id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL, `from_cientity_id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL, `to_cientity_id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL, `direction` ENUM ('from','to') DEFAULT NULL, KEY `idx_rel_id` (`rel_id`), KEY `idx_from_cientity_id` (`from_cientity_id`), KEY `idx_to_cientity_id` (`to_cientity_id`) ) ENGINE = INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4
mapper.delete: ALTER TABLE ${tableName} DROP COLUMN `${attrVo.id}_hash`, DROP COLUMN `${attrVo.id}`
